title: Aural set, Aime-moi - new feature in section 3

content.prompt: Section 3 restates musical material from section 1 and introduces which of the following compositional features?

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply procedures for melodic and rhythmic transformation in performed music.
